amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to require another Senate confirmed officer with HHS to carry out the negotiation duties should the Secretary of HHS have a conflict of interest. The General Counsel of HHS would be responsible for identifying these conflicts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-334 to require another Senate confirmed officer with HHS to carry out the negotiation duties should the Secretary of HHS have a conflict of interest. The General Counsel of HHS would be responsible for identifying these conflicts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Kennedy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kennedy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
